messages.text:

What about Go functions with multiple return values?

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com, remy@archlinux.org),

https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

LGTM after formatting fix.
Sorry for the delay.
